WildMagicSurge5E.opt_wms_feat_name_name: Name of the Wild Magic Surge feat
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_wms_feat_name_hint: If you play in another language, this enables you to set the name of the feat to your language.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_toc_feat_name_name: Name of the Tides of Chaos feat
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_toc_feat_name_hint: If you play in another language, this enables you to set the name of the feat to your language.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_powm_feat_name_name: Name of the Path of Wild Magic feat
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_powm_feat_name_hint: If you play in another language, this enables you to set the name of the feat to your language.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_incremental_check_t: When enabled, each time a incremental check type for a surge changes it is posted to Chat for others to see.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_whisper_gm_hint: When enabled, all messages are sent as Blind GM messages instead of from the player.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_chat_msg_hint: When automation is disabled, this message will show in chat to remind you when a spell is cast.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_hint: When disabled, will ignore all other options and alert to the Chat Message. When enabled, will create a chat message to remind you to ask for a check.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_spell_regex_: Enable a check based on the spell name as to whether the spell cast is a sorcerer spell.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_spell_regex_hint: The RegEx to differentiate between sorcerer spells and non sorcerer spells. This assumes the sorcerer spells to be renamed like 'Magic Missile (S)'. Special characters must be escaped!
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_msg_hint: On a Wild Magic Surge, show this message.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_auto_d20_msg_no_sur: On a failed auto Wild Magic Surge roll, show this message.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_toc_hint: Enables Tides of Chaos auto recharge when a Wild Magic Surge occurs.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_rolltable_enabled_h: Enable Auto Roll on a Wild Magic Surge Table.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_rolltable_name_hint: The Roll Table to use when rolling for the surge effect. Enter the name of the Roll Table.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_rolltable_powm_name: Path of Wild Magic Roll Table Name
The Roll Table to use when rolling for the Barbarian Path of Wild Magic surge effect. Enter the name of the Roll Table.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_custom_roll_dice_fo: Set the dice formula you want to roll. The default is 1d20.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_custom_roll_result_: The target result of the dice roll
What is the dice roll result you want to check against. For multiple value use a comma seperated value list like '1, 4, 10'.
Based on the target dice roll, should the result be less/greater than or equal to the result to trigger the Wild Magic Surge.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_tsl_die_hint: Set the dice formula you want to roll. The default is 1d20.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_tsl_lvl1_hint: Spell Level Dependent Roll Options. Each must start with either a >, < or = followed by a space and a number.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_surge_type_hint: Choose how you want to play, either Standard, Spell level dependent rolls, Incremental Check or Incremental Check Chaotic. Incremental Check Chaotic: For the amazingly awesome chaotic players and GMs. Instead of checking every time a spell is cast, at the start of every turn in combat, the threshold is increased by `1` for a Surge to a maximum of `10`. Once triggered the threshold is reset back to `1`. Incremental Check: Every time a spell is cast, the threshold is increased by 1 for a Surge. Once triggered the threshold is reset back to 1. Spell level dependent rolls: Wild Magic Surge triggers dependent on spell level (Set options below). Descending Dice: On no Surge roll d20,d12,d10,d8,d6 then d4 until a surge, then reset back to d20.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_npcs_name: Track Wild Magic Surge for NPCs
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_npcs_hint: Enabling this setting will automate Wild Magic Surge for Non Player Characters as well as Player Characters.
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_surge_toc_na: Auto surge on spell use after Tides of Chaos has been used
WildMagicSurge5E.opt_enable_surge_toc_hi: When Tides of Chaos is used, any 1st level spell and higher will trigger a surge and restore your Tides of Chaos.
